## ExtrudedPolygonTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[ExtrudedPolygonStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ExtrudedPolygonTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<ExtrudedPolygonTechniqueParams> 
```
